natural solution: First, we combine like terms in the expression: \begin{align} &(6a^3+92a^2-7)-(-7a^3+a^2-7)\\ & \qquad=6a^3+92a^2-7+7a^3-a^2+7\\ &\qquad=13a^3+91a^2. \end{align}We can factor out a $13a^2$ from the expression, to get \[13a^3+91a^2=\boxed{13a^2(a+7)}.\]
